verses.verse: I waited <S%H6960><s%> patiently <S%H6960><s%> for Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> He turned <S%H5186><s%> to me, <S%H8085><s%> and heard my cry. <S%H7775><s%>

He brought me up <S%H5927><s%> also out of a horrible <S%H7588><s%> pit, <S%H953><s%> out of the miry <S%H3121><s%> clay. <S%H2916><s%> He set <S%H6965><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> on a rock, <S%H5553><s%> and gave me a firm place <S%H3559><s%> to stand. <S%H838><s%>

He has put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> even praise <S%H8416><s%> to our God. <S%H430><s%> Many <S%H7227><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H3372><s%> and fear, and shall trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> who makes <S%H7760><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> his trust, <S%H4009><s%> and doesn't <S%H6437><s%> respect the proud, <S%H7295><s%> nor such as turn aside <S%H7750><s%> to lies. <S%H3577><s%>

Many, <S%H7227><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> are the wonderful <S%H6381><s%> works which you have done, <S%H6213><s%> and your thoughts <S%H4284><s%> which are toward us. <S%H5046><s%> They can't be declared back to you. <S%H5046><s%> If I would declare and speak <S%H1696><s%> of them, <S%H6105><s%> they are more than can be numbered. <S%H5608><s%>

Sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and offering <S%H4503><s%> you didn't <S%H2654><s%> desire. You have opened <S%H3738><s%> my ears. <S%H241><s%> You have not required <S%H7592><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and sin offering. <S%H2401><s%>
Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H935><s%> I have come. It is written <S%H3789><s%> about me in the book <S%H5612><s%> in the scroll. <S%H4039><s%>
I delight <S%H2654><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> your will, <S%H7522><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%> Yes, <S%H8451><s%> your law is within <S%H8432><s%> my heart. <S%H4578><s%>"

I have proclaimed <S%H1319><s%> glad news of righteousness <S%H6664><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly. <S%H6951><s%> Behold, <S%H3607><s%> I will not seal my lips, <S%H8193><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you know. <S%H3045><s%>

I have not hidden <S%H3680><s%> your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> my heart. <S%H3820><s%> I have declared <S%H559><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and your salvation. <S%H8668><s%> I have not concealed <S%H3582><s%> your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> from the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly. <S%H6951><s%>

Don't <S%H3607><s%> withhold your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> from me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. Let your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> preserve me. <S%H5341><s%>

For innumerable <S%H4557><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> have surrounded <S%H661><s%> me. <S%H5771><s%> My iniquities have overtaken <S%H5381><s%> me, <S%H3201><s%> so that I am not able to look up. <S%H7200><s%> They are more <S%H6105><s%> than the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head. <S%H7218><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> has failed me. <S%H5800><s%>
Be pleased, <S%H7521><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me. <S%H2363><s%> Hurry to help <S%H5833><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh.

Let them be disappointed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H5595><s%> it. <S%H5472><s%> Let them be turned backward <S%H268><s%> and brought to dishonor <S%H3637><s%> who delight <S%H2655><s%> in my hurt. <S%H7451><s%>
Let them be desolate <S%H8074><s%> by reason <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> that tell <S%H559><s%> me, <S%H1889><s%> "Aha! Aha! <S%H1889><s%>"

Let all those who seek <S%H1245><s%> you rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in you. <S%H157><s%> Let such as love your salvation <S%H8668><s%> say <S%H559><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> "Let Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> be exalted! <S%H1431><s%>"

But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%> May the Lord <S%H136><s%> think <S%H2803><s%> about me. <S%H5833><s%> You are my help and my deliverer. <S%H6403><s%> Don't <S%H309><s%> delay, my God. <S%H430><s%>
